textBox.richText: Joe’s Crab Shack is dead to me

I can’t wait to play Heavy Rain. Rich narrative, complex characters, many paths... it sounds like just my type of thing, so I was intrigued by this article. Heavy Rain is the kind of game women can fall in love with. I wonder, is it too late for Sony to get the memo? In other news, here is a very useful little Gamasutra article by Darius Kazemi I found on writing a resume for a game company, especially for college students or recent grads. Of course, the information applies to other industries as well. Spoiler alert: Kazemi says to leave out that irrelevant and embarrassing _______ job that still gives you the occasional frustration nightmare. From now on, Joe’s Crab Shack is dead to me. Why did I ever wait so long?!
